TitleEnglish: Fist of the North Star: Legend of Raoh - Chapter of Fierce Fight
SummaryEnglish: Earth was devastated by a terrible nuclear conflict that wiped out any sign of civilization. In this scenario, kenshiro and Raoul will face off.
Aliases: Hokuto no Ken: Raoh Gaiden Gekitou-hen
The Legend of Raoh Fierce Fight
